name: The Scarlet Gallery
description: You are Keiran Leibowitz, a Private Detective in Cross-Roads Louisiana. People are turning up dead with their organs removed. There is an event in town run by a man with a shady past and people have reported seeing strange children running amok in the middle of the night. Organ theft? A serial killer? Mob hit? Play the game and find out! With 20+ possible endings, you will be dying to solve this case!
developers: Ghoul Shadows - Tales of the Twisted.
